segments.text: Oh . Henry . I haven't seen you in ages . Come in . Let me take your coat . How are you getting along ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Please take a seat . Everything will be ready in a minute .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you go . We have your cocktail and there're salad . fried chicken , French fries and vanilla ice cream for dessert . Eat the chicken while it's hot . It tastes better .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Wow ! You're right . Everything is absolutely delicious . Please pass the pepper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Here you are . Taste the French fries .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Here's to our friendship and health !
segments.speaker: S2
